item.title: Thomas add a quote by Dan Fogelberg
item.description: "I've seen the bottom And I've been on top But mostly I've lived in between" -- Dan Fogelberg

item.title: Thomas add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Thomas add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Thomas add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "Once there were brook trout in the streams in the mountains. You could see them standing in the amber current where the white edges of their fins wimpled softly in the flow. They smelled of moss in your hand. Polished and muscular and torsional. On their backs were vermiculate patterns that were maps of the world in its becoming. Maps and mazes. Of a thing which could not be put back. Not be made right again. In the deep glens where they lived all things were older than man and they hummed of mystery." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Thomas add a quote by Anthony Burgess
item.description: "A perverse nature can be stimulated by anything. Any book can be used as a pornographic instrument, even a great work of literature if the mind that so uses it is off-balance. I once found a small boy masturbating in the presence of the Victorian steel-engraving in a family Bible." -- Anthony Burgess

item.title: Thomas add a quote by Anthony Burgess
item.description: "If you write fiction you are, in a sense, corrupted. There's a tremendous corruptibility for the fiction writer because you're dealing mainly with sex and violence. These remain the basic themes, they're the basic themes of Shakespeare whether you like it or not." -- Anthony Burgess

item.title: Thomas add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "You forget what you want to remember, and you remember what you want to forget." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Thomas add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "There is no God and we are his prophets." -- Cormac McCarthy
